de.unibox.http.servlet.type

Class ProtectedHttpServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • de.unibox.http.servlet.type.ProtectedHttpServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminHttpServlet, AuthHandler, Communicator, DashboardHandler, DatabaseHandler, GameHandler

    public class ProtectedHttpServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    The Class ProtectedHttpServlet is a Security Layer for Servlets which should prevent these from unauthorized access.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
